name: Pratush Saravanan
major: Molecular and Celular Biology and Bioengineering
title: Biopharm Team Member
bio: The potential for space-inspired biodesign and bioengineering is a new and burgeoning field. Engineering towards a future of space biology provides us the opportunity to explore a whole new world of science and technology. Through STAC, I hope to contribute to this field while discovering the unknown yet to be discovered.
